summary: A collection of pytest fixtures and helper utilities that generate synthetic iMOD and MODFLOW‑6 model data, configurations, and expected results for use in the test suite. The fixtures cover flow, transport, wells, lakes, unstructured grids, backward‑compatibility datasets, and coupled MSW models, enabling rapid assembly of model instances and verification of model execution.
business_intent: Support automated testing and quality assurance of the iMOD modeling platform by providing ready‑made, in‑memory datasets and model configurations that mimic real‑world scenarios, ensuring code correctness, backward compatibility, and reliable integration of various model components.
